molSimplify.Classes.ligand module¶

molSimplify.Classes.ligand.get_lig_symmetry(mol, loud=False, htol=3)[source]¶

Handles ligand symmetry assignment input: mol (Mol3D object) input: htol (Default 3, tolerance for hydrogens in matching ligands) input: loud (Default False, run ligand_assign_consistent with loud flag) output: outstring (String, ligand symmetry plane)

initialize()[source]¶
isPristine(unbonded_min_dist=1.3, oct=False)[source]¶
is_edge_compound()[source]¶

Check if a structure is edge compound. Request: 1) complexes with ligands where there are at least two connected non-metal atoms both connected to the metal.

is_linear_ligand(ind)[source]¶
is_sandwich_compound()[source]¶

Check if a structure is sandwich compound. Request: 1) complexes with ligands where there are at least three connected non-metal atoms both connected to the metal. 2) These >three connected non-metal atoms are in a ring. 3) optional: the ring is aromatic 4) optional: all the atoms in the base ring are connected to the same metal.
